question: been to see a colonoscopy doctor this morning due to weight loss -poor appetite- chronic diarrhoea-extreme fatigue.she ordered a ct scan as I have reduced kidney function due to diabetes and she felt this would be better for me. at the end she said she didn't think I would have a tumour as my diarrhoea  has been going on so long {18months) so does that mean she is looking for something else.
title: unsure
